A sermon preached at Hartford assises, March 14. 1616 by John Squire ... Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653.
[4], 21 p.
Printed by T.S. for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sould at his shop at the south-entrance of the Royall Exchange, London : 1618.
Marginal notes. Signatures: [A]⁴(-A1) B-C⁴ D². Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
